Pre-Game Insights: San Antonio went 22-60 overall with a 12-29 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Spurs gave up 118.6 points per game while committing 17.2 fouls last season.
Washington finished 15-67 overall with an 8-33 record on the road a season ago.
The Wizards shot 47.0% from the field and 34.8% from 3-point range last season.
San Antonio has a 3-game road losing streak.
Malaki Branham is day to day (ankle), Tre Jones is out (ankle), and Jeremy Sochan is out (thumb) for San Antonio.
Saddiq Bey is out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon is out (thumb), and Richaun Holmes is day to day (illness) for Washington.
